mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reply (member_id, product_id, content, groupno, levelno, orderno) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{productId}, #{content}, #{groupNo}, #{levelNo}, #{orderNo} )
mapper.update: UPDATE reply SET content = #{content}, regdate = Now() WHERE reply_id = #{replyId}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM reply ORDER BY groupno DESC, orderno ASC LIMIT #{page}, 10
